The included MASCHINE 2 software is exploding with cutting-edge technology. Improved browsing, arranging, and sampling, plus a new mixer, plug-in strip, and exclusive drum synths. Get ready for the most responsive, fluid, and musical beatmaking experience ever.

Plus, you get KOMPLETE SELECT Ã¢â‚¬â€œ a premium selection of 10 KOMPLETE Instruments and Effects. THE WORLD OF MASCHINE
Explore the entire the MASCHINE family Ã¢â‚¬â€œ integrated software/hardware systems for advanced, intuitive groove production. Cutting-edge MASCHINE 2 software features a powerful audio engine, unlimited groups and effects sends, multicore support, MASCHINE 2 Drum Synths, scale, arp, and chord functions, and much more. And three flavors of hardware deliver the perfect beat making tool for every studio.

UNSTOPPABLE TEAM
MASCHINE and KOMPLETE form an unstoppable production team. Browse and load KOMPLETE Instruments and Effects into MASCHINE. Changelog: New in version 2.3.1

Presets and Samples can now be marked and filtered as favorites

Option to always use latest version of NI plugins added to preferences

Fixed Issues:

Incorrect key colours shown for Polyplex on the Komplete Kontrol S Series keyboards.
Wrong item deleted from the browser when using the delete key.
Parameters could disappear / change appearance when holding HW buttons.
Unclear labels on the Maschine Mk2 Mixer screen.
Sample deleted when using "save samples as" over the original sample.
Old group/sound name is displayed when loading a new group/sound.
Inconsistent parameters in the filter module.
Crash on exit if certain projects were loaded.
Aux send routings not correctly imported from iMaschine.
Unclear labels on the Maschine Mikro nav page when no parameter pages available.
Undocked plugin windows still shown after undoing plugin loading.
Komplete Kontrol S Series displays not updated after undoing plugin loading
Browser not refreshed after deleting large number of entries..
Group / Sound routings removed after loading a new group.
multi-select parameter edit only applies to the focused sound.
Parameters not shown when loading presets from the internal browser of NI plugins.
